title: Dirichlet -- positive log prob
body_html:
🐛 Bug

When sampling from dirichlet distribution and computing its log prob, we sometimes get positive value .

To Reproduce

Steps to reproduce the behavior:
import torch.distributions as D
d = D.dirichlet.Dirichlet(torch.rand(3))
d.log_prob(d.sample())

We get output like
tensor(0.7762)

Expected behavior

We would expect log_prob to be always negative.
